site.title: Cixin Course Weaver
site.description: Ci-Xin Waldorf's bilingual course archive, connecting lesson goals with teaching artifacts, media folders, and downloads for planners and partners.
site.homepage_description: This site is a living museum of teaching ‚Äî a space where courses become stories and learning becomes art. It gathers journeys co-created by teachers and students, spanning from Taiwan's myths to the world's masterpieces. Browse through notebooks, blackboard art, performances, and melodies, and rediscover the living pulse of education that continues to bloom within.

homepage.hero_title: Courses become stories. Learning becomes art.
homepage.course_section_copy: Follow the Waldorf rhythm‚Äîfrom blackboard landscapes to drama performances and playlists‚Äîto see how teachers and students learn together.
homepage.category_section_copy: Jump into collections by grade, domain, or material and find the right inspiration.
homepage.ethos_title: Making Learning a Profound Life Experience
homepage.ethos_copy: At Ci-Xin, we believe education is a journey where we accompany children as they experience, feel, and create. Every course begins from real-life contexts‚Äîwhether delving into literature, history, or nature‚Äîusing art as a bridge to transform knowledge into profound inner strength. We invite you to join us in sparking children's curiosity, transforming learning from mere memorization into stories that are lived and told.
ethos_points: Integrating subjects with drama, stories, and art to deepen the learning experience
Guiding children to start from their life experiences and connect with the real world
Encouraging teachers to transform materials and create unique learning paths for children
